tagline: Open source continuous integration tool with tight integration to GitHub.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Sebastian CI
body:
### Goals

Sebastian CI is a replacement for other CI tools, learning from previous solutions:

1. Integration with GitHub (e.g. Pull Request-awareness)
2. Deploying should be as simple as `java -jar sebastian.war`
3. Isolate build environments using Vagrant (Virtual Box)

### Contributing
Take a look at [GitHub issues](https://github.com/sebastian-ci/sebastian-ci/issues), log ideas, submit pull requests.
